channel.title: ~~SYnergy pkz~~ Anti-leech < Last crappy part to help with =/
channel.description:
Hello! Well i am close to unleeching teh source i fixed teh server.ini then i returned this error: happens when i log-in with the client into the server,the error is seen in run.bat Whats wrong? how do i fix that? :) i will reward someone who will help me :D and no i wont leech it :)
[17:25:26] Btw*: java.lang.nullpoinerexception [17:25:35] Btw*: at client .rightclickcheck client.java:1863 [17:25:37] Btw*: at client process [17:25:43] Btw*: at playerhandler.rpocess.playerhandler.java [17:25:49] Btw*: at process.run process.java:23 [17:25:57] Btw*: at java.lang.thread.run<unknow source>

at client.processclient.java:21935

item.dc:creator: @Continue Continue
item.description:
@Continue wrote:

It can’t just say this, though:

at client.rightclickcheck<client.java:1860> at client.process<client.java:21935> at playerhandler.process<playerhandler.java:366> at process.run<process.java:16> at java.lang.thread.run<unknow source> connection from IP Loading process completed (YAY) Null disconnected <IP>

What’s at the client? What kind of error is pointing to the places that it’s saying?

item.title: ~~SYnergy pkz~~ Anti-leech < Last crappy part to help with =/
item.dc:creator: @Continue Continue
item.description:
@Continue wrote:

Did you edit the playersOnline() method and the rightClickCheck() at all? Also, try this for your playersOnline method.

public void playersonline() { clearQuestInterface(); if(server.playerHandler.players != null) { sendQuest("@bla@Synergy-Pkz 317", 8144); //Title sendQuest("@bla@ Players Online: "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+i, 8145); } sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushoutStream(); }

If you get any errors, please post.

Read full topic
item.source: ~~SYnergy pkz~~ Anti-leech < Last crappy part to help with =/

item.title: ~~SYnergy pkz~~ Anti-leech < Last crappy part to help with =/
item.dc:creator: @nerdiam nerdiam
item.description:
@nerdiam wrote:

hello. my client.class returns as line out of range. The client.java did found something though:
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
public void playersonline() {
clearQuestInterface();
for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.maxPlayers; i++) {
if(server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
sendQuest("@bla@Synergy-Pkz 317", 8144); //Title
sendQuest("@bla@ Players Online: “+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 8145);
sendQuest(”@bla@"+server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName, 8147+i);
}
}
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushoutStream();
}
public void rightClickCheck() {
if(isInWilderness == false) {
outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);

Am i doing everything right ?

Read full topic

item.title: ~~SYnergy pkz~~ Anti-leech < Last crappy part to help with =/
item.dc:creator: @Continue Continue
item.description:
@Continue wrote:

You have a NullPointerException. Usually when you give something a null and you use it as a null. Or you nulled something and it returned as a null. Go into your client class and do Ctrl G and type in “1863” without the quotes. Give me the method that the line is in and I’ll try and help you.

Read full topic
